title: Top Places to visit in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh
content: Guntur (About this soundpronunciation (help·info)); is a city within the Andhra Pradesh Capital Region. title: Top Places to visit in Kadapa, Andhra Pradesh
content: Kadapa (alternatively spelled Cuddapah) is a city in the Rayalseema region of the south-central part of Andhra Pradesh, India . It is the district headquarters of Kadapa district. As of 2011 Census of India, the city had a population of 344,078. It is located 8 kilometres (5.0 mi) south of the Pe

title: Pakistani F-16 Pilot Dies After His Own Countrymen Lynched Him On Suspicion Of Being An Indian
content: The Pakistani pilot whose F-16 was shot down by Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthman, has succumbed to his injuries inflicted by his own countrymen. It should be noted that the pilot of F-16 had ejected after getting hit in an aerial engagement and had managed to land safely in his own territory. H

title: Top Places to visit in Krishna, Machilipatnam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Krishna district is an administrative district in the Coastal Andhra region of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. Machilipatnam is the administrative headquarters and Vijayawada is the most populated city in the district. It has an area of 8,727 km2 (3,370 sq mi) and had a population of 45,29,00

title: US seeks information on Pakistan's potential misuse of F-16s
content:
WASHINGTON: The US is seeking more information from Pakistan on the potential misuse of American-made F-16 fighter jets by it against India in violation of the end-user agreement, the State Department has said.
The Indian Air Force on Thursday displayed parts of an AMRAAM beyond visual ra

title: Defence Minister meets Wing Commander Abhinandan in New Delhi
content:
Raksha Mantri Nirmala Sitharaman on Saturday met Wing Commander Abhinandan at the Army Hospital in New Delhi.
 
The Defence Minister conveyed to him that the entire nation is proud of his courage and determination. She also enquired about his health and condition.

title: Top Places to visit in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh
content: Kurnool is the headquarters of Kurnool district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.[5] The city is often referred as The Gateway of Rayalaseema.[6] It was the capital of Andhra State from 1 October 1953 to 31 October 1956. As of 2011 census, it is the fifth most populous city in the state with

title: Terrorist Maulana Masood Azhar, head of Pakistan-backed Jaish-e-Mohammad, dead
content: Jaish-e-Mohammad Chief Maulana Masood Azhar is reportedly dead. Sources said that Azhar died on March 2 at a military hospital in Pakistan's Rawalpindi. Pakistan is yet to make any formal announcement in this regard but top intelligence sources claimed that Azhar died due to liver cancer. </

title: Top Places to visit in Prakasam, Ongole, Andhra Pradesh
content: Prakasam district is an administrative district in the Coastal Andhra region of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The headquarters of the district are located at Ongole. Top Places to visit in Srikakulam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Srikakulam is a city and the district headquarters of Srikakulam district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh
content: Visakhapatnam is the largest city and the financial capital of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
